questions: Q. 1. Name the cell organelles which is generally small sized in animal cells and large in plant cells.
Q. 2. List any two single celled  organisms.  1 Mark each
Q. 3. Mention the difference between Prokaryotes and Eukaryotes in terms of nuclear region present in them.
answers: Ans. Prokaryotic cells do not have a well defined nuclear region known as nucleoid where as Eukaryotic cells have a well defined nucleus.
